Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that the kangaroos are rejoicing in the rain during the Australian bushfires, when in fact the photo was taken in 2014 and has nothing to do with the fires.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading post and does not provide any evidence or verifiable information.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo was taken in 2014 and has no connection to the current Australian bushfires.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the kangaroos in the photo are celebrating the rain, without any evidence or context to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the kangaroos in the photo are not celebrating anything and are likely to have been affected by the fires, as stated by the photographer.
Falters at times: The claim falters by using a misleading photo and misrepresenting the situation during the Australian bushfires.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
